entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon. POP 30%
